channel.title: How the heck do you get no-ip or just a normal server
channel.description: Ok i know hwat your gonna say first: "read the sticky" I read the 'guide' sticky and yes i told me how to make a hamachi server but i want to make a regular or a no-ip server. I READ THROUGH THE ENTIRE THING THERES NOTHING ON IT ABOUT NO-IP SERVERS. Can someone please help?

item.title: How the heck do you get no-ip or just a normal server
item.dc:creator: @_mike2 ^mike^
item.description:
@_mike2 wrote:

moparscape isnt on the list…your supposed to click 1st STMP Server.

Read full topic

item.title: How the heck do you get no-ip or just a normal server
item.dc:creator: @jarrell1022 jarrell1022
item.description:
@jarrell1022 wrote:

well if u plan to use it only urself then simply run the runserver.bat and run moparscape and enter in the correct data
ex.ip:0.0.0.0 port:43594 or 5555 (the 2 most popular)

Read full topic

item.title: How the heck do you get no-ip or just a normal server
item.dc:creator: @phoenix55 phoenix55
item.description:
@phoenix55 wrote:

i have 2 problems with that…

  1. My router’s model isnt on the list (its reasonably new).

  2. Mopar scape isnt on the procedeing list.

now what

edit:

[quote=“i blkwolf i, post:2, topic:118359”]hmmmm… you need to port forward and go to www.no-ip.com and register,then make a host to your ip you got using cmd and then etc you cna figure it out easy from there. i hope this helped
~I Blkwolf I~[/quote][quote=“i blkwolf i, post:4, topic:118359”]no, its not noobie,anyway you enter cmd in the run>startmenu
then you enter your defualt gateway into your adress bar,and then enter your user and pass and go to advanced and fill it out,and you have a working server using no-ip!! I Hope This Helped
~I Blkwolf I~[/quote]

ok i found a similar topic and was readign through another persons guide to getting no-ip, and i got all the way to jsut about the end and got confused, hwo am i supposed to know what my username and password are?

Read full topic

item.title: How the heck do you get no-ip or just a normal server
item.dc:creator: @_mike2 ^mike^
item.description:
@_mike2 wrote:

first off,register at www.no-ip.com. After you register at the tabs to the left click add, then pick your name and ip and everything,then go to the downloads and pick your type of computer and donload DUC. Now start DUC then click the box with your server name by it. NOw heres the part people have trouble with, portforwarding. Now to portforward you need a router. go to www.portforward.com select routers,then select your type of router,then after that for the type of game, click 1st STMP Server then follow the tutorial on how to set a static ip and everything. then go and register your server. hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: How the heck do you get no-ip or just a normal server
